ej,willd104,M,welkt901,Call at 1B (Reversed) $Mariners manager Williams ejected by 1B umpire Welke for arguing reversal of call; Stapleton originally called out, then Red Sox manager McNamara argued, umpires conferred and reversed call to safe which caused Williams to argue and get ejected1986BOS.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,mcnaj801,M,evanj901,Catch/trap call (Reversed) $Red Sox manager McNamara ejected by 2B umpire Evans for arguing arguing that ball hit by Boggs was not caught1986BOS.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,candj001,P,kaisk901,Arguing balk from previous game $Angels Candelaria, not in game, ejected by 2B umpire Kaiser for arguing about balk called  by 3B umpire Brinkman in previous game1986BOS.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
ej,franj002,P,cobld901,Bench jockeying $Indians Franco (not in game) ejected by 3B umpire Coble for bench jockeying1986BOS.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
